name: name of the variable
function: function of the variable in the system
changable: are later changes in variable content allowed?

name: project.status
function: as verification step for starting the email process

name: project.provider
content: name of the project provider (e.g. a club)

name: project.mail
function: as mailto for project specific mails

name: participants.age1to5
function: as decision criterion for version of typeform (smiley scales)

name: participants.age6to10
function: as decision criterion for version of typeform (text scales)

name: participants.age11to15
function: as decision criterion for version of typeform (text scales)

name: participants.age16to19
function: as decision criterion for version of typeform (text scales)

name: participants.age20to26
function: as decision criterion for version of typeform (text scales)

name: participants.worker
content: number of adult participants in projects for qualification
function: as decision criterion for version of typeform (text scales)

name: project.goals
function: as logical criterion for questionnaire creation

name: project.start
function: as logical criterion for mailto send date (e.g. initial mail)

name: project.end
function: as logical criterion for mailto send date (e.g. reminder mail)
